DOC.brief_summary: The main purpose of this two-part study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of the study drug known as LY2880070 in participants with advanced or metastatic solid tumors.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of LY2880070 in Patients With Advanced or Metastatic Cancer

clinical benefit For Part A Must have evidence of cancer (solid tumors, excluding glioblastoma and primary brain tumor) that is advanced or metastatic For the Metabolism Phenotype Arm in Part A,
